description:
The Introduction to Equity Markets course will give you a basic overview of the equity markets, and help you understand what they are and how they work. This is a self-paced program, covering 5 modules spread over 23 videos spanning 7 hours. There are no prerequisites â€“ anyone can take this course. This course is entirely free and covers the following:

(i) Structure and methods of raising equity capital(ii) Instruments such as common and preferred stocks(iii) The buy-side and sell-side participants(iv) The different types of equity markets(v) Processes involved in trading in equity instruments

At the end of the video lectures, we have also prepared a quiz that will test your knowledge of the equity markets. We hope that you have an effective and enjoyable learning experience.

Thank you,Imarticus Learning
title: Introduction to Equity Markets
